title: Piper Down Pub
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Irish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 21+ years old only Irish pub. Offers an extensive array of vegan pub food choices such as happy buffalo wings, taquitos, wraps, burgers, Irish corn dog. Vegan brunch dishes are huevos rancheros, compost hash, breakfast burrito. Traditional Irish pub theme, some live music, karaoke, poker, live pub trivia, free Wi-Fi.
